message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, $20,000 is closer to my asking price. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me. $15,000 is still a bit too steep for my budget.  Could you do $11,500?
Hi Bob, it seems like we are getting closer. To make this happen, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, thanks for your flexibility. I can tell this is important to you.  I could do $12,000. That's the absolute best I can offer.
